Buildercore

Sales management software for real estate developers.

Decrease costs and prevent lost sales

Buildercore is a cloud-based sales management solution for medium and high-rise real estate developers. Buildercore centralizes and streamlines the back office tasks and paperwork associated with the pre and post-construction sales process of real estate development projects. With Buildercore, all stakeholders can retrieve, submit, and update information relevant to a project, from any location, via a standard web browser.
